## Use RCall.jl together with JuliaCall

<img src="RCall.png" style="width: 800px;"/>

If you set the option of `useRCall = TRUE` in `julia_setup()`,
which is the default setting.
You could integrate the use of R and julia even more!
For example, the julia command `R"Rcommand"` will 
evaluate "inline" R command,
and you can go into R REPL mode in `julia_console()` by simply pressing
`$`.

## Parallel Computation in JuliaCall

<img src="parallel.png" style="width: 800px;"/>

Note that due to the issue 14577 in julia v0.6.0,
it is not possible to do parallel computation using `JuliaCall`
and julia v0.6.0, but the issue is already fixed,
and the parallel functionality should work using
`JuliaCall` and future release of julia.
